name: Creamy Garden Cucumber Salad
author: EQUILDOTTSIN
summary: Wonderful side dish to have at your family cookouts! Quick and easy, and the flavors really transform your garden cucumbers. You can also add grape or cherry tomatoes for enhancement. Keep in the refrigerator until ready to serve.
ingredients: salt and ground black pepper to taste
1 (1 ounce) package ranch dressing mix (such as Lipton® Recipe Secrets®)
directions: Arrange cucumber slices in a large bowl, generously seasoning each layer of cucumber with salt and pepper
Cover bowl with plastic wrap and refrigerate for 3 hours
Gently press cucumber slices with paper towel to absorb any remaining liquid
Stir half-and-half, sour cream, mayonnaise, green onions, ranch dressing mix, sugar, dill, celery salt, and lime juice together in a small bowl; pour over cucumber slices and gently stir to coat
